vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.25.2;
son of: Asaph (H0623H);
brother of: Zaccur (H2139J), Joseph (H3130I) and Nethaniah (H5418H); also called Jesharelah at 1Ch.25.14;
Also named: ye.sar.e.lah (יְשַׂרְאֵ֫לָה "Jesharelah" H3480)
§ Asarelah = "God holds"
a son of Asaph, appointed sanctuary musician by David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Asaf; cantor del templo; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞薩利拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "神掌握"
亞薩的眾子之一, 被大衛指派唱聖樂的工作 (代上25:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚萨利拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "神掌握"
亚萨的众子之一, 被大卫指派唱圣乐的工作 (代上25:2)
